seo.title: Credits
seo.description: Credits for technologies and tools used

sections.heading: Credits
sections.content: We're grateful for the amazing technologies and communities that made this project possible.

sections.heading: Core Technologies
sections.content: This project is built with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, leveraging modern web standards and best practices.

sections.heading: Content Management
sections.content: Sanity provides a powerful headless CMS that enables flexible content modeling and real-time collaboration.

sections.heading: Styling & UI
sections.content: Tailwind CSS provides utility-first styling, and Radix UI components offer accessible primitives for building interfaces.

sections.heading: Community & Support
sections.content: The open-source community continuously improves the tools and libraries we rely on daily.

sections.heading: Special Thanks
sections.content: Special thanks to all contributors, maintainers, and the broader developer community for making this ecosystem possible.
